label: H0 = 71.55 as V7 unfolding rate
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: H0 = 71.55 as V7 unfolding rate. Validation: Resolves Hubble tension
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
H0 = reg.h0_local                # 71.55 km/s/Mpc
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
odowd = reg.odowd_bulk_pressure  # 163 - O'Dowd bulk pressure
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144
sophian = reg.sophian_drag       # 0.6819 - Sophian drag term

# H0 formula: (ROOTS/4) - (P_O/chi_eff) + eta_S
# H0 = 72 - 1.132 + 0.6819 = 71.55
base = roots / 4                 # 72
bulk_correction = odowd / chi    # 163/144 = 1.132
H0_derived = base - bulk_correction + sophian  # 71.55

# Verify derivation matches registry value
verified = abs(H0_derived - H0) < 0.01
